name: Volker Weidler
introduction: Volker Weidler (born 18 March 1962 in Heidelberg, Karlsruhe, Baden-Wrttemberg, West Germany) is a German retired racing driver who competed in Formula One for the Rial team in 1989.  Outside of F1, he won the 1991 edition of the 24 Hours of Le Mans for Mazdaspeed with Bertrand Gachot and Johnny Herbert.
